mapper.select: select b.id , b.btitle, b.bcontent, b.bfile, b.bip , b.bpass, b.bhit , b.create_date, m.id as member_id , m.username as member_username, m.nickname as member_nickname from board b left join member m on b.member_id = m.id order by b.id desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}

select b.id , b.btitle, b.bcontent, b.bfile, b.bip , b.bpass, b.bhit , b.create_date, m.id as member_id , m.username as member_username, m.nickname as member_nickname from board b left join member m on b.member_id = m.id order by b.id desc

select b.id , b.btitle, b.bcontent, b.bfile, b.bip , b.bpass, b.bhit , b.create_date, m.id as member_id , m.username as member_username, m.nickname as member_nickname from board b left join member m on b.member_id = m.id where b.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into board( btitle, bcontent, bfile, bip , bpass, bhit , member_id ) values ( #{btitle}, #{bcontent}, #{bfile}, #{bip} , #{bpass}, #{bhit} , #{member.id} )
mapper.update: update board set btitle=#{btitle} , bcontent=#{bcontent}, bfile=#{bfile} where id=#{id} and bpass=#{bpass}
mapper.delete: delete from board where id=#{id} and bpass=#{bpass}
